title: Tower Wear
description: Tower-Wear is a wear companion app for 3DR Tower.NOTE: This app requires the Android Wear app to be installed on the device.
descriptionHTML:
Tower-Wear is a wear companion app for 3DR Tower.

NOTE: This app requires the Android Wear app to be installed on the device.
comments: Works well, needs small fix Works well for me (G Watch R). Only thing a bit annoying is that the notifications keep on displaying o  the watch even if tower on the phone is not active. Would be great to have this suppressed when Tower is not running on the phone.

App is not working with my LG Urbane 2 with a Samsung Note 4. My watch says the app is installed, but there is no option to launch it anywhere. The companion on the phone seems to work. Please fix this.
Constantly notifying Great app but always on my watch even when not running on my phone. Lg g watch r
Can you change it from meters per second to MPH on Tower?
Works on my note 4 But will it work with moto 360?
Works great on the moto 360 Love it! Keep it up 3D Robotics!
